categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Cretacian was Leia Organa's Gallofree transport ship in the early days of the Galactic Civil War.

While on a mission to Krant in 0 ABY in order to meet Utric Sandov, the ship had a fight with TIE/LN starfighters and crashed on the planet. Organa, the protocol droid C-3PO and eight Rebel troopers survived the crash.
Cretacian appears in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds.
